resources.string: User needs to register themselves to access the smart features. Registration can either be done by mobile phone or using Gmail. User can skip the Login and register later.
User can enjoy unlimited applications with our Smart Store and Google Play Store.

Multimedia module is available to users for their enjoyment by listening to music, looking at photos, to relax and suit the mood. Browse between music, video, picture and by clicking on the selected file, enter the appropriate interface.
Music interface displays the internal and external music resources.
Video interface displays the internal and external video resources.
Picture interface displays the internal and external picture resources.
Shows various types of file: video, audio, txt file of different format.

Apps contains different types of apps, browser, file manager, application manager & memory manager. User can access various downloaded apps by press “APPS” key in remote or by pressing "HOME" key and navigating to Apps.

Press the [Home Screen] key to go to homepage. Home page contains three categories, Home, AppStore and Source. 

1. In Home, user can access different types of downloaded and pre-installed apps like browser, file manager, application manager, E-manual, appstore, wireless display & memory manager etc. 
2. In App Store, user can access Google Playstore. 
3. For Source, refer to the second page.
Videos can downloaded through this app. Using arrow reach to this app icon then press “OK” key.
Users can browse the web pages.
Enables access of downloaded files of different types.
File manager to view various type video, audio & text files.
Enables user to manage installed apps.
Users can install applications from internal and external storage.
Users can free cache memory using this.
Enable to clean RAM by deleting junk & cached files.
A Complete build in guide for user to understand SMART TV\'s various operation.
Press the [setting] key from remote or select setting from application window.
Used for setting up Wi-Fi, LAN and other connections.

1. Open settings then open network.
2. Browse to third option named “Wireless Connection”.
3. Press the right direction key to go to Wi-Fi, then turn it on by clicking [OK]
4. Select the network to be connected then click [OK].
5. Enter the password and then go to “Save” click [OK].

1. Open settings then open network
2. Browse to second option named “Wired Connection”.
3. Press the right direction key to go to Open Ethernet, then turn it on by clicking [OK]. (it is on by default)
4. Either enter the network address of the connection to be connected manually or choose “Automatically Obtain IP Address”

1. Open settings then open network
2. Browse to fifth option named “Wireless Hotspot”.
3. Press the right direction key to go to Wi-Fi Hotspots, then turn it on by clicking [OK]
4. Set up the network and then go to save and press [OK].
5. Then turn on the Wi-Fi of the device you want to connect and find the network.
6. Select that network and enter the set password to connect.

1. Open settings then open network
2. Browse to fourth option named “PPPoE Connection” then turn it on by clicking [OK].
3. Press the right direction key and enter Username and Password, then go to Dial and press [OK]
4. If want to disconnect, go to hang and press [OK].
For selecting language, by default has been set to English.
Shows information about device’s network layer and other information.

Shows the option for screen mirroring. Turn on the wireless display of TV first, then turn on the screen mirroring function in your smart phones. Your phone will start scanning devices. Select the “Smart TV”, screen mirroring will start.
Different TV modes like ATV, AV, HDMI, can be accessed as per the requirement of the user by pressing [SOURCE] key from remote and selecting appropriate mode and then pressing [OK] key.

In ATV mode, press MENU key from remote, the screen will pop-up a TV menu interface. TV menu is on the TV for the user attributes related settings (including picture settings, sound settings, channel settings , settings etc.). It is divided into four major options: picture , sound , channel , settings, . Use arrow keys to navigate then press [OK] to enter.
To set various channel functions ,It has following options:
By color system ,Color system encoding can be selected :PAL or NTSC. By default PAL is selected
Through sound system you can select various sound format : D/K , I, B/G & M. By default B/G is selected
Channel can be tuned manually, after accessing manual search ,go to “increase” or “decrease” than press “OK” from remote, to search channel in manual mode.
To search the channels automatically , go to “AUTO SEARCH” than “START SEARCHING” through arrow keys in remote & press “OK”.\n\nNote: for picture, sound and setting refer next para .
*Note - TV must be connected to an Internet Connection while registration.

Insert the HDMI cable in the HDMI port, Press [SOURCE] key then select the respective HDMI port and then press [OK]. HDMI supports Audio Return Channel (ARC) to feed output to AV receiver. HDMI supports high-speed bidirectional data communication link (HEC). HDMI supports Consumer Electronics Control (CEC). HDMI supports HDCP compliant devices.
Picture Settings are used for picture adjustment functions, you can adjust the user options here. The options are shown below. select the appropriate value adjustment, as shown.

To choose between different picture modes like :
STANDARD
BRIGHT
SOFT
USER
Backlight level can be increase or decrease by this function.
Various color temperature mode : STANDARD ,WARM, COOL can be selected through this feature.
Aspect ratio of screen can be selected with following option : 4:3 ,16:9,FULL SCREEN, ZOOM 1,ZOOM 2.
This feature for enhancing the picture quality by suppressing the digital noise.
To balance the left & right speaker audio output.
To select between different SPDIF out options.
T.V will automatically go to sleep mode after select time period, If this mode is enable.
To change the no signal screen color to blue.
This option is lock the function of manual key, when key lock “ON” manual key button will not function by pressing.

It is a feature of HDMI designed to allow users to command and control devices connected through HDMI by using only one remote control. For example by using the remote control of a television set to control a set-top box and or DVD player.
Menu display time can be set through MENU TIME .
Connect the A.V. connector. Select A.V. mode.
